snippet: C.J. Fair was a loser on Senior Day in the Carrier Dome and in the only Atlantic Coast Conference tournament game he'll ever play. Enough already for Syracuse's smooth-shooting swingman....

headline.print_headline: Syracuse Faces Western Michigan in NCAA Tournament
headline.main: Syracuse Faces Western Michigan in NCAA Tournament

lead_paragraph: C.J. Fair was a loser on Senior Day in the Carrier Dome and in the only Atlantic Coast Conference tournament game he'll ever play. Enough already for Syracuse's smooth-shooting swingman.
